about_the_game:
Noslrac is a casual and content-rich dungeon crawler 2D ARPG with 4 unique classes each with a differing playstyle and distinctive skill tree. Noslrac features thrilling combat that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Noslrac features tab targeting combat verseus traditional action combat found in most ARPGs, which allows for a more fun, accessible, and casual experience. Take control of your conqeror, defeat ever-increasingly powerful enemies to gain power beyond mortal comprehension. Defeat the minions of Noslrac, and find a cure for the sick and feeble King of Banglesway before all hope is lost.

4 Classes to choose from

Choose from up to 4 unique classes for your campaign of defeating Noslrac. Each class has a unique playstyle, rotation, and skill tree. Will you play the Champion who smashes their enemies with powerful blows up close and personal, or will you play the Wizard and reign fire from afar and scorch your enemies? There is a class for you, whatever playstyle you prefer!

Infinite end game progression

Slay enemies to gather keys to an Onslaught, a powerful dungeon with increased difficulty and rewards. Venture into the dangers of Onslaughts and slay all those who dare to stop you. Each Onslaught has unique modifiers to make each and every run unique, challenging, and fun. Conqueror the Onslaught, and you will be rewarded handsomely.

Skill Trees

Each class comes with a unique and distinct talent tree that enhances the player's core rotation. Gain skill points as you level, further increasing your power to slay even the most powerful of enemies.

Fully customizable equipment

Gather resources from your conquests to craft the most powerful items in Noslrac. If you want to craft a 2 handed axe that increases your strength by 100, you can do that. If you want to craft a heavy helmet that grants 2,000 life after you kill an enemy, you can do that as well. You can put any modifier, any number of sockets, and any amount of power you want into an item. Tailor your conqueror to how you want to play!

Campaign Editor

Fully customize your own campaigns to venture on. Create the most immersive, combat filled, and fun campaign your mind desires. The world is your imagination.

Features

  • 4 unique classes
  • Cohesive and unique damage rotations
  • Skill trees
  • Tier sets
  • Infinite endgame progression
  • Intricate loot system
  • Randomly generated items
  • Fully customizable items
  • Multiplayer
  • Over 50 achievements
  • Campaign editor

name: Noslrac

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIndows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4th generation or similar
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIndows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 integrated, NVIDIA GT 650m graphics card or better DirectX11 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: A casual dungeon crawler ARPG with 4 unique classes with differing playstyles. Choose your conqueror, level up, slay monsters, complete campaigns, conqueror the darkest dungeons, obtain powerful items, and craft the ultimate items to cleanse Banglesway of corruption.
